pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Women's Basketball Play by Play Data // A utility for working with women's basketball data. A scraping and aggregating interface for the WNBA Stats API https://stats.wnba.com/ and ESPN's https://www.espn.com women's college basketball and WNBA statistics. It provides users with the capability to access the game play-by-plays, box scores, standings and results to analyze the data for themselves.
